resources.string: This wonderful game is great for fun. The game will cheer you up and help train your skill and attention! And these cute little animals will help you with that!
It is a cat. She is very cool and brave. Everyone loves cats.
It is a bison! He is the strongest, but he is also very kind!
It is an eagle! It is the most agile and the fastest. No one flies higher than an eagle!
It is a horse! He is the fastest and the wisest. The horse is graceful and beautiful!
